about_the_game:
Tear through the first world of Don't Die, Collect Loot - The Lost Forest. Play as the Adventurer, Beastmaster, and Arcanist as you battle against four deadly bosses on three difficulty levels.

Additionally challenge Don't Die, Collect Loot's infinitely scaling endgame, The Endless Nightmare.
detailed_description:
Tear through the first world of Don't Die, Collect Loot - The Lost Forest. Play as the Adventurer, Beastmaster, and Arcanist as you battle against four deadly bosses on three difficulty levels.

Additionally challenge Don't Die, Collect Loot's infinitely scaling endgame, The Endless Nightmare.
name: Don't Die, Collect Loot Demo
short_description: Fight through hordes of nightmare enemies and collect mountains of randomly generated loot. Play as the Adventurer, Beastmaster, and Arcanist on three difficulties, and challenge the endgame!
